summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6282 for the improvement of Alton Ave. Northeast from Northeast 105th St. to 40th Ave. Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 92045, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
